titleStmt.title: The poem of poems. Or, Sions muse contayning the diuine song of King Salomon, deuided into eight eclogues.
Poem of poems.
titleStmt.author: Markham, Gervase, 1568?-1637.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iames Roberts for Mathew Lownes, and are to be solde at his shop in Saint Dunstones Church,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Saint Dunstones Church
